casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth Calvin CHANDLER 189A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 19, 2019 Katherine Jane Allen, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Chandler, Kenneth Calvin. Jennifer T. Harrod, Raleigh, G. Glenn Gerding, Attorneys at Law, Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*167The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 19th of June 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of June 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 22nd day of July 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
